scripts.dev: npx concurrently "sass src/styles/style.scss public/assets/styles/style.css --watch" "nodemon --watch src/scripts -e js --exec \"mkdir -p public/assets/scripts && cp src/scripts/client.js public/assets/scripts/client.js\"" "nodemon --watch src/scripts/server.js --exec \"mkdir -p public/assets/scripts && cp src/scripts/server.js public/assets/scripts/server.js\"" "nodemon src/scripts/server.js"
scripts.build:js: mkdir -p public/assets/scripts && cp src/scripts/client.js public/assets/scripts/client.js && cp src/scripts/server.js public/assets/scripts/server.js
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
